places.description: A dictionary of places, where keys are place IDs and values are place labels (strings).

transitions.description: A dictionary of transitions, where keys are transition IDs and values are transition labels (strings).

arcs.description: An array of arc objects, each defining a connection between a source and a target node.

from.description: The ID of the source node (must be a defined place or transition ID).

to.description: The ID of the target node (must be a defined place or transition ID).

initial.description: A dictionary defining the initial marking of the Petri net. Keys are place IDs, values are the number of tokens (integers, >=1).
